(:action use ; Use a resource or ability and update status
    :parameters (?actor - person ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?resource) (condition_met ?actor ?resource))
    :effect (and (utilized ?actor ?resource))

(:action listen
    :parameters (?npc - person ?source - entity)
    :precondition (and 
                    (not (has_listened ?npc ?source))
                    ;; Additional context-specific preconditions
                    (or 
                        (and (at ?npc library) (available ?source catalog))  ;; for listening to libraries
                        (and (at ?npc home))  ;; for listening to broadcast
                        (and (has_reflection_time ?npc))  ;; for listening to family
                        (and (topic_chosen ?source) (structured_approach ?npc))  ;; for listening to bible
                        (and (not (has_listened ?npc ?source)))  ;; for listening to shelter
                    )
                  )
    :effect (and 
              (has_listened ?npc ?source)
              ;; Additional context-specific effects
              (or 
                  (checked ?source catalog)  ;; for listening to libraries
                  (listened_to_broadcast ?npc)  ;; for listening to broadcast
                  (acknowledged_blessings ?npc ?source)  ;; for listening to family
                  (taking_notes ?npc)  ;; for listening to bible
                  (has_listened ?npc ?source)  ;; for listening to shelter
              )
            )

(:action choose ; General action for choosing or acquiring resources or making selections
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?location - location ?collection - collection)
    :precondition (and 
        (or 
            (and (at ?agent ?location) (not (selected ?location)))
            (and (available ?location ?item) (not (inventory ?agent ?item)))
            (and (bare ?agent))
            (and (not (has ?agent ?item)))
            (and (status ?collection in_progress))
            (and (status ?collection proofread) (not (submitted ?collection)))
        )
        (or 
            (visible ?agent)
            (not (has_location ?agent ?location))
            (not (has_comfortable_location ?agent))
        )
    )
    :effect (and
        (or 
            (selected ?location)
            (inventory ?agent ?item)
            (has ?agent ?item)
            (chosen ?agent)
            (status ?collection chosen)
            (submitted ?collection)
            (location ?collection ?location)
            (has_location ?agent ?location)
            (has_comfortable_location ?agent)
        )

(:action divide ; Divide a resource into sections or parts for organization
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (form_chosen ?entity) (inventory ?entity ?resource))
    :effect (sections_divided ?resource)
)

(:action start ; Initiate a task or activity, updating the relevant status
  :parameters (?n - npc ?res - resource)
  :precondition (and 
                  (available ?n) 
                  (not (engaged ?n ?res))
                  (or (taking_notes ?n) (has ?n ?res))
                  (or (decorated ?res) (not (writing ?n ?res)))
                )
  :effect (and 
           (engaged ?n ?res)
           (or (shared_bible_journaling ?n) (writing ?n ?res))

(:action keep
    :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?location - location ?container - container)
    :precondition (and
        (or (has_journal ?npc) (has ?npc ?item) (location ?item in_hand ?npc) (location ?item on_countertop))
        (not (or (journal_with ?npc ?item) (safe ?item) (entries_consistent ?item) (location ?item in_container ?container)))
    )
    :effect (and
        (or (journal_with ?npc ?item) (safe ?item) (entries_consistent ?item) (location ?item in_container ?container))

(:action read ; Read an item and update knowledge
    :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (not (has_read ?npc ?item)))
    :effect (and (has_read ?npc ?item))

(:action take ; Take an item and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (possesses ?entity ?item) (not (taken ?entity ?item)))
  :effect (taken ?entity ?item)
)

(:action reflect ; Reflect on a subject and update status
  :parameters (?entity - person ?subject - object ?context - situation)
  :precondition (and 
    (engaged_in ?entity ?subject)
    (prepared ?entity ?context)
  )
  :effect (reflected ?entity ?subject)
)

(:action stay ; Maintain or achieve a specific state for an entity within a location
    :parameters (?npc - person ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location))
    :effect (and (centered ?npc))

(:action review ;  Review a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?npc - person ?resource - object ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (has_resource ?npc ?resource) (contextual_time ?context) (not (reviewed ?npc ?resource ?context)))
    :effect (reviewed ?npc ?resource ?context)
)

(:action treat ; Apply treatment to enhance and refine a resource
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource ?condition - condition)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?entity) (depleted ?resource) (rough ?condition))
    :effect (and (enhanced ?entity) (replenished ?resource) (smooth ?condition)
                 (not (depleted ?resource))

(:action study ; Study a specific subject or material
  :parameters (?npc - person ?material - object)
  :precondition (and (not (studied ?npc ?material)))
  :effect (and (studied ?npc ?material))

(:action be ; Be in a desired state regarding a specific condition
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?condition - attribute)
    :precondition (and (not (?condition ?entity)))
    :effect (?condition ?entity)
)

(:action process_and_store_item
  ; Process an item through a series of preparatory steps and store it in a designated location
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (prepared ?agent) ; The agent is ready to process the item
    (not (processed ?agent ?item)) ; The item has not yet been fully processed
    (not (stored ?item))) ; The item is not yet stored in its place
  :effect (and 
    (processed ?agent ?item) ; The item is processed by the agent
    (stored ?item))
